name: Factory Control (katistixstudios)
description:
A game by Katistix Studios made for GMTK Game Jam 2020 in under 48 hours.

The idea is to not lose the control of the factory at which you work. Do your job and you will not run OUT OF CONTROL!

Notes and Known Bugs:

  • Designed for 16:9 aspect ratio. Any other ratio may make the game look or feel strange
  • Loosing a bit to early when the reactor is heating up

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow keys
